communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Description of Records Sought: 
All records created or received by ICE FOIA in responding to the prior Freedom of Information Act request assigned the following tracking numbers by ICE:  
2023-ICAP-00174
2021-ICAP-00843
2020-ICFO-64605
(Full proceedings available here: https://www.muckrock.com/foi/united-states-of-america-10/detention-standards-compliance-unit-reports-2019-77302/#comms) 

Please task the ICE FOIA Office with an initial for any processing notes, FOIA Taskers, E-FOIA Express entries, SecureRelease entries agency component responses, or other search information contained in paper files, emails, calendar entries, instant messages, chats, SharePoint files, Teams communications, memoranda, text messages, voice mails or memos, or other agency records pertaining to ICE’s handling of this FOIA request and the two associated appeals. 

Please specifically provide information regarding the following questions: 
The date on which ICE FOIA tasked the search
The custodians ICE FOIA tasked with a search 
The responses of custodians to the search taskings following the initial search, the search on remand, and any records review performed by OPLA-GILD during appellate review in both administrative appeals. 

We make this request on behalf of the Al Otro Lado #DetentionKills Transparency Initiative.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Free
